parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster you want to update.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Idempotency ensures that an API request completes only once. With an idempotent request, if the original request completes successfully. The subsequent retries with the same client token return the result from the original successful request and they have no additional effect. If you don't specify a client token, the Amazon Web Services SDK automatically generates one. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the cluster to update.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the updated cluster.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the updated cluster.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time of when the cluster was created.

nested_items.name: deletionProtectionEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether deletion protection is enabled for the updated cluster.

nested_items.name: witnessRegion
nested_items.description: The Region that receives all data you write to linked clusters.

nested_items.name: linkedClusterArns
nested_items.description: The ARNs of the clusters linked to the updated cluster. Applicable only for multi-Region clusters.
